plot: How would you react to the worst phone call of your life? As the news spreads, the one most affected becomes the last to hear.
title: Everything Can Change in a Moment
plot_es: How would you react to the worst phone call of your life? As the news spreads, the one most affected becomes the last to hear.
original_name: Everything Can Change in a Moment
plot_en: How would you react to the worst phone call of your life? As the news spreads, the one most affected becomes the last to hear.
